files.README.md:
# Cloud Fullstack Skills

A Claude Code plugin marketplace for cloud deployment and full-stack development.

## Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [modal-deployment](plugins/modal-deployment) | Serverless Python with GPUs using Modal |
| [tanstack-start](plugins/tanstack-start) | Full-stack React with TanStack Start |

## Installation

Add this marketplace to Claude Code:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add ferdousbhai/cloud-fullstack-skills
```

Then install plugins:

```bash
/plugin install modal-deployment@cloud-fullstack-skills
/plugin install tanstack-start@cloud-fullstack-skills
```

## License

MIT
files.plugins/modal-deployment/README.md:
# Modal Deployment Plugin

Run Python code in the cloud with serverless containers, GPUs, and autoscaling using [Modal](https://modal.com).

## When to Use

- Deploying ML models with GPU acceleration
- Running batch jobs and parallel data processing
- Scheduling cron jobs in the cloud
- Serving APIs with serverless infrastructure
- LLM inference and model training/fine-tuning

## Features

- Zero-config serverless Python execution
- GPU support (A10G, A100, H100)
- Automatic scaling and cold start optimization
- Built-in storage (volumes, dicts, queues)
- Web endpoints and scheduled functions

## Installation

```bash
/plugin install modal-deployment@cloud-fullstack-skills
```
files.plugins/tanstack-start/README.md:
# TanStack Start Plugin

Full-stack React framework with SSR, server functions, and Vite bundling.

## When to Use

- Building full-stack React applications
- Server-side rendering with TanStack Router
- Creating server functions with `createServerFn`
- Deploying to Cloudflare Workers
- Integrating TanStack Query with SSR

## Features

- File-based routing with TanStack Router
- Type-safe server functions
- SSR and streaming support
- Cloudflare Workers deployment
- TanStack Query integration

## Installation

```bash
/plugin install tanstack-start@cloud-fullstack-skills
```

files.README.md:
# Investor Plugins

A Claude Code plugin marketplace for financial analysis and trading.

## Installation

```bash
# Add the marketplace
/plugin marketplace add ferdousbhai/investor-plugins

# Install plugins
/plugin install investor@investor-plugins   # Market data & research
/plugin install tasty@investor-plugins      # TastyTrade brokerage
/plugin install alpaca@investor-plugins     # Alpaca Markets
/plugin install ibkr@investor-plugins       # Interactive Brokers
```

## Plugins

| Plugin | Description | Source |
|--------|-------------|--------|
| `investor` | Market data, sentiment, earnings, stock research | [investor-agent](https://github.com/ferdousbhai/investor-agent) |
| `tasty` | TastyTrade brokerage integration | [tasty-agent](https://github.com/ferdousbhai/tasty-agent) |
| `alpaca` | Alpaca Markets trading API | [alpaca-mcp-server](https://github.com/alpacahq/alpaca-mcp-server) |
| `ibkr` | Interactive Brokers trading | [interactive-brokers-mcp](https://github.com/code-rabi/interactive-brokers-mcp) |

## Configuration

### Alpaca

```bash
export ALPACA_API_KEY="your-key"
export ALPACA_API_SECRET="your-secret"
```

### Interactive Brokers

Requires Node.js 18+. On first run, browser opens for OAuth authentication.

### TastyTrade

See [tasty-agent README](https://github.com/ferdousbhai/tasty-agent) for authentication setup.

## License

MIT
